attributes.action: Cancel The BTEC Exams For Further Education Students.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to cancel these exams for Us students so it is fair among further education students. It's disappointing that the board of education has given our exams the go-ahead when the same people our age don't have to worry about their A-Levels or equivalent
attributes.background: The National Lockdown has just begun and A-Level Students and GCSE Students have had their exams cancelled. Why is it that us BTEC students have to go in, risking our lives in a global pandemic? We Need to cancel These Exams.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
